TextLibrary.Text: That weapons dealer also sold complete weapons to two other groups. One of them was a Jahrwoxi merchant. That means if we want to get it from him on Jahrwox Prime we'll need to bring a gift or two in exchange. That shouldn't be anything your mining skills cannot handle though.

That weapons dealer also sold complete weapons to two other groups. One of them was a Jahrwoxi merchant. That means if we want to get it from him on Jahrwox Prime we'll need to bring a gift or two in exchange. That shouldn't be anything your mining skills cannot handle though.
